column5: Here’s a easy diy to make line holders for your spools. All you need are headbands, beads and a glue gun. Hope this helps you out.
I think it looks like a great idea? Dan.

im gonna make some of these to work in conjunction with my plano box i will let you guys know how it goes. the plano box has sucked so far but if these bands keep the line spooled better it might be a winner.
I use it for steelheading when I'm usually pulling out line often during an outing.  I've always gone with the rubber bands but they don't always hold the line in place.
I like this as opposed to rubber bands ,,, looks a lot easier to remove if you have big fat fingers ... LOL
I use 2 elastic bands knotted together to form a figure 8. The one that goes around the spool is usually those that come off broccoli (quite wide).The other one is for pulling on.
